TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpServerChannel extends System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiverHook
Public Class HttpServerChannel Inherits BaseChannelWithProperties Implements IChannel, IChannelReceiver, IChannelReceiverHook
type HttpServerChannel = class inherit BaseChannelWithProperties interface IChannelReceiver interface IChannel interface IChannelReceiverHook

summary.span: 針對遠端呼叫實作使用 HTTP 通訊協定傳輸訊息的伺服器通道。

span.span: Implements a server channel for remote calls that uses the HTTP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道會傳輸郵件，跨越遠端界限 （例如，應用程式定義域上的電腦） 之間。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, between computers on application domains). 類別將使用 HTTP 通訊協定的訊息傳輸。The class transports messages using the HTTP protocol. .NET Framework 遠端基礎結構會使用通道來傳輸遠端呼叫。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 當用戶端呼叫遠端物件，呼叫會序列化成訊息是由用戶端通道所傳送和接收的伺服器通道。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然後，它會還原序列化，並處理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何傳回的值是經由伺服器通道，且由用戶端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 若要執行額外的伺服器端上的訊息處理您可以指定的實作透過所處理的所有訊息傳遞。To perform additional processing of messages on the server-side, you can specify an implementation of the through which all messages processed by the are passed. 接受二進位或 SOAP 格式序列化的訊息。The accepts messages serialized in either binary or SOAP format. A物件中具有相關聯的組態屬性可以在設定執行階段組態檔中 (藉由叫用靜態方法) 或以程式設計方式 (藉由傳遞集合建構函式）。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 如需這些組態屬性的清單，請參閱文件。For a list of these configuration properties, see the documentation for . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用設定遠端處理伺服器和其用戶端的物件。The following code example shows how to use a object to set up a remoting server and its client. 此範例包含三個部分：The example contains three parts: - 在伺服器A server - 用戶端A client - 伺服器和用戶端所使用的遠端物件A remote object used by the server and the client 下列程式碼範例顯示的伺服器。The following code example shows a server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CPP/server.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CS/server.cs#20)] 下列程式碼範例會示範此伺服器的用戶端。The following code example shows a client for this server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CPP/client.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CS/client.cs#30)] 下列程式碼範例顯示的伺服器和用戶端使用的遠端物件。The following code example shows the remote object used by the server and the client. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CPP/common.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CS/common.cs#40)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式子組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數來`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CPP/server2.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CS/server2.cs#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式設定屬性使用`name`參數。This constructor sets the property by using the `name` parameter. 如果您想要註冊多個通道，每個通道都必須具有唯一的名稱。If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name. 若要要求可用的通訊埠動態指派，設定`port`參數設為 0 （零）。To request that an available port be dynamically assigned, set the `port` parameter to 0 (zero). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. summary.span: 取得目前通道的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the current channel.
A object that contains the name of the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個已註冊的通道都有唯一的名稱。Every registered channel has a unique name. 這個名稱用來呼叫時，擷取特定通道。This name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelPriority As Integer
public: property int ChannelPriority { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前通道的優先權。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 整數，表示指派給通道的優先權。

span.span: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 優先順序會控制哪一個通道資料會出現在次序執行個體; 較低優先順序通道之前出現的較高優先順序通道。The priority controls the order in which channel data appears in a instance; higher priority channels appear before lower priority channels. 用戶端嘗試連線到它們列在順序中的伺服器通道執行個體。Clients try to connect to the server channels in the order that they are listed in the instance. 預設優先權為 1;允許使用負數的優先順序。The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed.

summary.span: 指示目前通道開始接聽要求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不需要呼叫這個方法，以開始接聽新初始化通道。It is not necessary to call this method to begin listening on a newly initialized channel. 使用這個方法來重新啟動之後在通道上接聽已經停止接聽通道上呼叫方法。Use this method to restart listening on a channel after the method has been called to stop listening on the channel. 如果您的通道會使用動態指派連接埠號碼，當您重新啟動接聽時，可能會變更您的連接埠號碼。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要停止接聽通道上使用這個方法。Use this method to stop listening on a channel. 若要重新啟動接聽，請使用方法。To restart listening, use the method. 如果您的通道會使用動態指派連接埠號碼，當您重新啟動接聽時，可能會變更您的連接埠號碼。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening.
